name: Cacti Run - Project for Godot Wild Jam #6
name_original: Cacti Run - Project for Godot Wild Jam #6
description:
This Game was made by a two man Team :)

For both, maurehago and me, was it the first Time to make a complete Game with the Godot Engine.
We decided to make this Project Open Source, so that everyone can take a look into this. We hope this will help you.

Godot says that the Strength is the textbased Workflow, scenes for example.
So we decided to Teamup and test this. We can say it was really good and fluid with GitHub also we had a lot of fun with this :)

Picked Theme from Godot Wild Jam #6 was "Cacti".

Have Fun and enjoy our Game :)

Greetings from Germany
German Godot Community

The Neo GameFactory

Godot Wild Jam # 6
